Trade/Device Name(s): illumigene® Group A Streptococcus (Group A Strep) DNA Amplification Assay
illumigene® Group A Streptococcus (Group A Strep) External Control Kit
Regulation Name(s): Group A Streptococcus spp. Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10 Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene Group A Streptococcus DNA Amplification Assay and External Control Kit for qualitative detection of S. pyogenes in throat swabs using LAMP on the illumipro-10 system
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detection of Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus) in throat swab specimens, intended as an aid in diagnosis of Group A Streptococcal pharyngitis in hospital, reference, or state laboratories; not intended for point-of-care use
